actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Employment Opportunities.

official_title: A bill to amend title VII of the Civil Rights Act of 1964 relating to nondiscrimination in employment by the House of Representatives.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Amends title VII of the Civil Rights Act of 1964 (Equal Employment Opportunity) to extend the prohibition against discrimination to cover employees of the House of Representatives.

titles.title: A bill to amend title VII of the Civil Rights Act of 1964 relating to nondiscrimination in employment by the House of Representatives.
